sentences.en: All you have to do is right-click on the desktop and select New Folder.
sentences.cn: 你只要在桌面上点击鼠标右键，选择“新建文件夹”就行了。

sentences.en: Choose the image you want by clicking twice.
sentences.cn: 双击鼠标选取所要的图像。

sentences.en: Click here to see some of our multibuy offers.
sentences.cn: 点击此处查看我们的一些多买优惠商品。

sentences.en: Click on the hyperlink.
sentences.cn: 点击超级链接。

sentences.en: Click on the printer icon with the mouse.
sentences.cn: 用鼠标点击打印机图标。

sentences.en: Click on this icon to align or justify text.
sentences.cn: 点击这个图标使文本排齐。

sentences.en: Click the square icon again to minimize the window.
sentences.cn: 再次点击正方形图标，把窗口最小化。

sentences.en: Click this option to right-justify the selected text.
sentences.cn: 点击这个选项，使选定的文本向右对齐。

sentences.en: Edmund clicked his fingers (= made a short sound to get someone’s attention ) for John to follow him.
sentences.cn: 埃德蒙弹了个响指示意约翰跟着他。

sentences.en: Go to Control Panel and double-click on Sounds for a list of sounds.
sentences.cn: 进入“控制面板”双击“语音”图标就能看到所有的声音选项。

sentences.en: If you get stuck, click on Help.
sentences.cn: 如果碰到疑难，就点击“帮助”。

sentences.en: If you've forgotten your login ID, click this link.
sentences.cn: 如果忘记了自己的注册账号就点击此链接。

sentences.en: Mother clicked her tongue (= made a short sound to show disapproval ) and sighed.
sentences.cn: 妈妈咂咂嘴，叹了口气。

sentences.en: The door clicked shut behind me.
sentences.cn: 门在我身后咔嗒一声关上了。

sentences.en: The hands of the clock on the wall moved with a slight click.
sentences.cn: 墙上挂钟的指针走动着，发出轻微的咔嗒声。

sentences.en: The telephone rang three times before I heard a click and then her recorded voice.
sentences.cn: 电话铃响了3次后我听见咔嗒一声，接着就是她的录音留言。

sentences.en: They get well along in public, but their personalities don't really click.
sentences.cn: 他们在公开场合相处融恰, 但他们的性情不是真正合得来的.

sentences.en: Twist the lever and the gears click into place .
sentences.cn: 转动变速杆，排挡就咔嗒一声到位了。

sentences.en: Vogel clicked his heels (= hit the heels of his shoes together ) and bowed.
sentences.cn: 沃格尔咔嗒一声并拢脚跟，鞠了个躬。

sentences.en: Whirr, click, whirr, click — step by step the scan probed deeper.
sentences.cn: 嗡嗡，咔嗒，嗡嗡，咔嗒——扫描探查一步步地深入。

sentences.en: You can check your e-mail with a click of your mouse.
sentences.cn: 通过鼠标的一点你就能查电子邮件。

sentences.en: You can check your email with a click of your mouse.
sentences.cn: 鼠标轻轻一点，即可查看电子邮件。

phrases.tran_cn: 点击这里，点击此处；单击此处
（物体，尤指机械装置部件）正好嵌入，恰好吻合

trans.tran_cn: 咔哒声，（鼠标）点击，吸气声
使发出咔嗒声，(用鼠标)点击，豁然开朗，（与…）一见如故，受到欢迎，配合默契
trans.tran_en: to make a short hard sound, or make something produce this sound
to press a button on a computer  mouse  to choose something from the screen that you want the computer to do, or to press a button on a  remote control
to make a short hard sound, or make something produce this sound
